long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adblock for Youtube is the perfect solution for an interruption-free and more comfortable Youtube experience. This browser extension blocks all ads and preroll videos, allowing you to watch videos without any interruptions. 

With this extension, you’ll be able to enjoy your videos without being bothered by unwanted ads and preroll videos, making your time on Youtube more enjoyable. 

it also blocks ads on websites featuring embedded YouTube videos.

Skip ad will look for the skip ad or skip ads buttons, and click them automatically to close the video ads for you. Although the buttons are displayed after 5 seconds, they are already prepared and extensions can click them to close the ads quickly. Video overlay ads, and column ads, will be hidden.

How to use:
1. Install the Ad Block YouTube chrome extension.
2. And that's it, go to Youtube and start enjoying your favourite Videos on YouTube without Ads.
 
Adblocker is more than just an extension, it's also a comprehensive online security solution. You can be sure that you're protected from online threats like malware, phishing, and harmful websites. Its crypto-jacking protection feature adds an extra layer of security by blocking known crypto-jackers.

Note!
YouTube is a trademark of Google LLC. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.

Install our user-friendly adblocker extension today and start skipping ads effortlessly. Enjoy a smoother, faster, and uninterrupted online video experience without any complex setup!
